ref: 3701 kṣīravallī f. ʻ Batatus paniculata ʼ lex. [kṣīrá -- , vallī -- ]
S. khīroli f. ʻ an annual creeper ʼ, ˚lī f. ʻ the tuberous root Cyperus tuberosus (eaten as a vegetable) ʼ;
N. khiraũlo, ˚ramlo ʻ a partic. plant used with curry ʼ;
Si. kiriväla ʻ the creeping plants Morinda umbellata and Ichnocarpus frutescens ʼ.
